description: Restructure the monorepo to remove the widget system and simplify architecture. Move PromptingWorkflow from a loadable widget to a direct React component. Delete packages/widgets/ directory, remove custom widget build scripts (build-widgets.js), and consolidate the project structure to packages/core, packages/dashboard, and packages/electron-app.
goal: Fix TypeScript build errors caused by duplicate type declarations in the widget system while simplifying the overall architecture. The current structure has type conflicts between the original widget package and the new component-based approach. Removing the widget system entirely will resolve these conflicts and reduce complexity.
requirements: Update build configuration and npm scripts
Ensure npm run build succeeds with no TypeScript errors
Maintain full functionality on both web (Next.js) and Electron platforms
out_of_scope: Fixing scroll issues on web app or Electron (note: user mentioned these but they're separate from restructuring)
constraints: Build must pass after restructuring (npm run build)
Both web app (dashboard) and Electron app must function correctly after changes
Preserve git history and existing commits
